title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
The First CeraVe Product That Irritates My Skin
body: I have slowly transitioned to all CeraVe products over the past year.  Day and night moisturizers, cleansers - my sensitive, easily irritated skin loves it all.Until using this eye cream.It's definitely thick, smoothes on easily.  But it stings when I use it.  And I don't mean I accidentally get some in my eyes and it stings - it actually irritates my skin.  Which is a shame because I really wanted to like it.For now I'll continue using my CV night facial moisturizer, which works just fine and doesn't sting or irritate.
